flashcards.title: let/var difference?
flashcards.description: Let for a block level variables, var for a function level

flashcards.title: Whats defensive semicolon?
flashcards.description: Semicolon at the start of the line to prevent accidental joining with previous statement

flashcards.title: when whitespace in source can impact semantics?
flashcards.description: Newline may trigger automatic semicolon insertion, for example return statement must occupy only one line
